item.title: Sarah add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Some day you will be old enough to start reading fairy tales again." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Scott Lynch
item.description: "Worst of all, the inner vault is guarded by a live dragon, attended by fifty naked women armed with poisoned spears, each of them sworn to die in Requin's service. All redheads. -You're just making that up, Jean." -- Scott Lynch

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Ayn Rand
item.description: "The question isn't who is going to let me; it's who is going to stop me." -- Ayn Rand

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Neal Stephenson
item.description: "Until a man is twenty-five, he still thinks, every so often, that under the right circumstances he could be the baddest motherfucker in the world. If I moved to a martial-arts monastery in China and studied real hard for ten years. If my family was wiped out by Colombian drug dealers and I swore myself to revenge. If I got a fatal disease, had one year to live, and devoted it to wiping out street crime. If I just dropped out and devoted my life to being bad." -- Neal Stephenson

item.title: Sarah add a quote by David Wong
item.description: "Welcome to freakdom, Dave. It’ll be time to start a Web site soon, where you’ll type out everything in one huge paragraph." -- David Wong

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "Space is big. You just won't believe how vastly, hugely, mind-bogglingly big it is. I mean, you may think it's a long way down the road to the chemist's, but that's just peanuts to space." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Scott Lynch
Sarah add a quote by Evelyn Waugh
item.description: "I've always been bad. Probably I shall be bad again, punished again. But the worse I am, the more I need God. I can't shut myself out from His mercy. ... Or it may be a private bargain between me and God, that if I give up this one thing I want so much, however bad I am, He won't quite despair of me in the end." -- Evelyn Waugh

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Ayn Rand
item.description: "I swear by my life and my love of it that I will never live for the sake of another man, nor ask another man to live for mine." -- Ayn Rand

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Robin Sloan
item.description: "Why does the typical adventuring group consist of a wizard, a warrior, and a rogue, anyway? It should really be a wizard, a warrior, and a rich guy. Otherwise who's going to pay for all the swords and spells and hotel rooms?" -- Robin Sloan

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "There is no such thing as a weird human being, It's just that some people require more understanding than others." -- Tom Robbins
